alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 22 at 3:31AM PST until January 22 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 40 mph with damaging gusts up to 65 mph. Strongest winds will be this morning in the foothills along the Interstate 210 corridor. * WHERE...San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highways 10, 57, and 60, as well as Interstates 210 and 605. In addition, the strong winds will produce restricted visibilities due to blowing dust.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
